name: Al-Aeshma Genie
description: The Al-Aeshma Genie is a large, chaotic elemental creature with a commanding presence in combat, often manifested as a swirling spray of coarse sand. It has a notable appearance and boasts agility, making it a formidable opponent.
memorable: Its unique regeneration ability allows it to heal each turn unless affected by fire or radiant damage, making it exceptionally resilient.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate aerial encounters, manipulating the battlefield and using its abilities to overwhelm enemies.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other genies or elemental beings.
environment: Commonly found in places where elemental energies converge, often above ground due to its flight capabilities.
strengths: Possesses a strong combination of resilience, agility, and powerful melee and magical attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire and radiant damage; limited in altitude due to the Earth Bound ability.
attacks: Can inflict slashing and necrotic damage through its scimitar and special ability, Dust Devil, which restrains and damages multiple targets.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration allows it to regain health every turn unless taking fire or radiant damage.
senses: Has darkvision with a range of 120 feet.
skills: Immunity to lightning and thunder damage enhances its durability against some elemental attacks.
additional_information: Air Hatred ability gives it advantage against flying creatures.
Elemental Demise causes it to disintegrate upon death.
Can create a Dust Devil to restrain and damage opponents in a specific area.
Can cast spells without needing material components.
Strategically uses its mobility and abilities to manipulate the battlefield.
spellcasting: Able to cast detect magic at will, create or destroy water (destroy only) and wind walk three times per day, along with gaseous form and invisibility once per day.
test_queries: creature that can create dust devil
